content: Last year we launched the survey in early September, and the results in early December. I don't necessarily think that that would be a bad timeline this year either especially if we had more help with translation.
Though that would be stacking work ontop of the edition which is the same timeframe.
If all goes to plan, the Edition work should largely be done by September
Sure, and not all work is done by the same people.
Took some time to write up an initial timeline: https://hackmd.io/@ryanlevick/rkG0OUHCu
